title: [1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata
body:
#### System information

Erigon version: `./erigon --version`
erigon version 2.42.0-stable-d8d04663

OS & Version: Windows/Linux/OSX
Linux

Commit hash: d8d04663483f639d2bdd016f588ac8d231e90396

Erigon Command (with flags/config):

```
/usr/local/bin/erigon --snapshots=true \
	--chain=mainnet \
	--datadir=/mnt/data/.ethereum \
	--externalcl \
	--http \
	--http.addr=0.0.0.0 \
	--http.port=8545 \
	--http.api=eth,debug,net,trace,web3,erigon \
	--authrpc.jwtsecret=/home/ubuntu/eth-mainnet/jwt.hex \
	--authrpc.port=8551 \
	--log.dir.path=/home/ubuntu/eth-mainnet/logs \
	--log.dir.verbosity=info \
	--torrent.upload.rate=20mb \
	--torrent.download.rate=250mb
```

Concensus Layer: Prysm

Concensus Layer Command (with flags/config):

Chain/Network: Mainnet

#### Expected behaviour
Can download snapshots

#### Actual behaviour

I've been stuck here for 3 days, please see the logs:

```
t=2023-04-13T10:17:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[txpool] stat" block=0 pending=40 baseFee=0 queued=2216 alloc=384.5MB sys=745.3MB
t=2023-04-13T10:17:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:18:05+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:18:25+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:18:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[p2p] GoodPeers" eth68=33 eth67=28 eth66=4
t=2023-04-13T10:18:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[txpool] stat" block=0 pending=40 baseFee=0 queued=2216 alloc=358.3MB sys=745.3MB
t=2023-04-13T10:18:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:19:05+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:19:25+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:19:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[txpool] stat" block=0 pending=40 baseFee=0 queued=2216 alloc=423.7MB sys=745.3MB
t=2023-04-13T10:19:45+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
t=2023-04-13T10:20:05+0700 lvl=info msg="[1/15 Snapshots] Waiting for torrents metadata: 51/99"
```

#### Steps to reproduce the behaviour


#### Backtrace

````
[backtrace]
````

Anyone can help to check? Thanks!

maybe your consensus client does not work properly
maybe you can use geth as the execution client

if not - try increase logs verbosity:
--log.console.verbosity=4 --torrent.verbosity=3

@AskAlexSharov now it's moving, but seems too slow I think. It took 3 days to reach 66/99.
Here is the logs:

